DisplayAnOpenChatFeedOnYourCommunitysPro: Display an open chat feed on your community’s profile.
BrandedLoginDescription: Display a custom login message when people are signing up to Parabaik directly from your community’s profile
SetACustomMessageForTheLoginScreen: Set a custom message for the login screen
CustomLoginMessagesShouldBeUnder280Chara: Custom login messages should be under 280 characters.
MigrateYourCommunityElsewhereDescription: Enabling this setting will redirect your community and channel pages to your community's website.
Existing conversations will stay accessible on Parabaik at their current URLs, but no new members can join and no new conversations can be created.
OptionalPreventThreadsInMyCommunityFromB: Optional: Prevent threads in my community from being indexed by search engines while redirection is active.
AreYouSureYouWantToDeleteYourCommunity: Are you sure you want to delete your community,
